channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: It's a first for Nicki Chapman and the team today as they head to glorious Guernsey in the Channel Islands. They're there to help find a fabulous family home for a young couple and their three children. Nicki also meets some of the island's most famous four-legged inhabitants, a herd of Guernsey cows.
